The Garden of Uncertainty

This is a place for seekers not finders. For explorers of the edge and voyagers without abode. Those who are homesick for places that never existed. Those with a natural distrust of all things firm, fixed, and frozen.

Take a stroll through the digital garden of uncertainty. Roam along the path and smell the lilies, or wander off into the shadows where dark roses bloom. However, be careful not to stray into the forest, where creatures howl in the nightâ€¦
